summary:
The Security Council,
Reaffirming previous resolutions and statements on Côte d’Ivoire, 
Reaffirming commitment to sovereignty, independence, territorial integrity and unity of Côte d’Ivoire,
Stressing importance of good-neighbourliness, non-interference and regional cooperation,
Welcoming UN Mission in Côte d’Ivoire (MINUCI) implementation,
 
1. Decides to renew for six months authorization for ECOWAS and French forces;
2. Requests ECOWAS and France to report periodically to Council through Secretary-General;
3. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
